data.expected_result: It says "Now Playing" for the game (Which is shown within client)
data.short_description: [Overlay] Overlay doesn't show "Now Playing" in Game info section
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a game which has Rich Presences (Needs this because of another bug)  - which has More info upon clicking it's game name. osu!, Fortnite or LOL are good examples. - Open overlay - Click on your own profile, and show the more info for your game.
